channel.title: Posts on picobird's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on picobird's blog

item.title: the most complete surge conf file
item.description: 最全Surge配置文件（1688 rules） 这份文件来自myunlu.com(提供shadowsocks服务的网站) 最近更新之后，surge conf文件格式全部错乱，手动整理了一下 放在这里做备份 Proxy = custom, 1.2.3.4,443,rc4-md5,password, http://surge.run/SSEncrypt.module null = http,null,1234 点击下载

item.title: install go tools (Golang 1.6)
item.description: 免翻墙安装Go tools (Golang 1.6) branch="release-branch.go1.6" mkdir -p $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x git clone -b $branch https://github.com/golang/tools.git $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x/tools git clone https://github.com/golang/net.git $GOPATH/src/golang.org/x/net cd $GOPATH go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/goimports go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/vet go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/oracle go install golang.org/x/tools/cmd/godoc 参考内容crazygit@github
